Topic.Title: Oh no say it isn't so!

Message.Msg: So you think the NOAA and the scientists who wrote this report--a report based on much of the research into global warming--are basing their conclusions on faith? That they are incompetent and cannot identify causation in weather patterns? Yet this one particular report from them is not based on faith? This one which you (wrongly) think provides evidence against global warming they got right? All of their scientific conclusions are balderdash except this one report? Is that your argument here, Froggie? Global warming isn't real because of the conclusion of scientists who, with the exception of this one report, you believe are completely incompetent? Yeah, right. We know exactly what you are Froggie. In our hearts and our heads, we know you're a fraud.

Topic.Title: Oh no say it isn't so!

Message.Msg: "Is that your argument here, Froggie? Global warming isn't real because of the conclusion of scientists who, with the exception of this one report, you believe are completely incompetent?" On the contrary, the agenda driven scientists have been very competent in their quest to persuade large numbers of people that the sky is falling. Only recently has the public been made aware of their tactics, and started to question their scientific methods and practices. I know that you believe that anyone who questions the consensus, must be against clean air and clean water. I can only speak for myself, I am against the manipulation of the masses by the powerful, and bad science. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Topic.Title: T Set Up To Reward Investors

Message.Msg: great report

Topic.Title: Oh no say it isn't so!

Message.Msg: "the agenda driven scientists have been very competent" So your argument is that NOAA and the climate scientists who wrote the report *you cite* are liars? You are claiming the source you cited is made up of agenda-driven scientists who use "tactics" and questionable scientific methods and practices? Well ain't that some sh**! This is pretty simple. Is the NOAA a reliable source for climate science or not?

Topic.Title: Oh no say it isn't so!

Message.Msg: " Is the NOAA a reliable source for climate science or not?" Good question: I believe that NOAA is a government agency that is made up of many good and honest scientists who provide a great service to the American people. Having said that, I also believe that because NOAA is a government agency, there are many within the agency who do have a political agenda that requires them to make findings that are contrary to good science, and more in line with the consensus du jour. Bottom line: I believe that a reasonably mature person evaluates the facts and science from many sources. Draws his or her own conclusions, and Determines sources that can be trusted and those that can't. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Topic.Title: Oh no say it isn't so!

Message.Msg: "many good and honest scientists?" Are these the same scientists who you claimed just moments ago were "agenda driven scientists" who use dishonest tactics and questionable scientific methods and practices "to persuade large numbers of people that the sky is falling"? The same people who responsible for "the manipulation of the masses by the powerful, and bad science."? "Determines sources that can be trusted and those that can't." The NOAA can be trusted, as can the climate scientists who wrote the report you cited. The NOAA and those scientists, along with the overwhelming preponderance of the scientific community, have concluded that global warming is real and that it is man-made. "I believe that a reasonably mature person evaluates the facts and science from many sources." I believe that too, Froggie. What exactly do you believe you are? You are such a weasel. In your heart you know I am right.
